review: I'm really pleased with my Amazon Fire TV. The only problem is that I've been staying up far too late watching movies.Set up was easy and the device worked as advertised. Movies and TV shows stream with no buffering. Even the search by speech works great. Highly recommended.
author: Gerald Greene

review: Good hardware.  The software could use a better user interface.  Plus the software won't let you play videos from a USB stick.  However I rooted the fire TV and installed some software which can.  Its working better now.

review: We're still learning to use it but so far we like it.  I just wish there were more free movies than there are.  We don't get to go to the movies and enjoy it when they come on TV.  An example is "Catching Fire" is free but "Hunger Games" is $5.99.  My husband hasn't seen the first movie yet and would like to see it first.  As a "Prime" member, there needs to be much more for free.
